title: Hammer Break
description: Nadia Moran is in serious trouble.  Bad enough that Lord Morvilind is forcing her to work with the Rebels. Even worse that the murderous Rebels want her dead.  But this time, the Rebels want her to rob a bank.  Specifically, the Royal Bank itself, the best-defended building in North America.  And unless Nadia uses all her magic and all her cleverness, she’s going to take the fall for the heist of the century…
author: Jonathan Moeller
